EmailTemplate.name: 17.BBAccess.POL.none.N.G.N.9216.FN POL.Email 03 - Go green with a LAN that consu
EmailTemplate.subject: Go green with a LAN that consumes 82% less energy
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Bring your LAN up to light speed Traditional local area networks consume a lot of energy. The active components coupled with the necessary cooling equipment are a significant contributor to an organization’s carbon footprint. But a new LAN solution called Passive Optical LAN has been proven to reduce energy consumption by up to 82%. What’s more, it also provides better performance than a traditional Ethernet-over-copper LAN.
Visit our website to learn more. Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
